name: Checking for an element in an array

0.name: Choose the method(s) to find out if an element exists in the array

1.name: What does the includes() method return?

3.name: Number of occurrences of an element in the array

2.name: What does the indexOf() method return?

1.name: The index of the first occurrence of the specified element in the array

2.name: The indices of all occurrences of the specified element in the array

3.name: The value of the specified element
What does the lastIndexOf() method return?

0.name: The index of the last occurrence of the specified element in the array

2.name: The index of the first occurrence of the specified element in the array

3.name: The value of the specified element

4.name: What do the indexOf() and lastIndexOf() methods return if an element is not found in the array?

5.name: Choose the correct syntax for indexOf() and lastIndexOf() methods

6.name: What is passed to the searchElement parameter in the indexOf() and lastIndexOf() methods?

0.name: This parameter takes the index of the element you want to find

1.name: The value of the element to be found is passed to this parameter

2.name: This parameter contains the index of the element from which you want to start the search

3.name: The index to be found is passed to this parameter

7.name: What is passed to the fromIndex parameter in the indexOf() and lastIndexOf() methods?

0.name: This parameter contains the index of the element from which you want to start the search

1.name: The value of the element to be found is passed to this parameter

2.name: This parameter takes the index of the element you want to find

3.name: The index to be found is passed to this parameter

8.name: What does it mean if the indexOf() and lastIndexOf() methods return the same number?

0.name: The value of the element is unique and is not repeated in the array

1.name: The element value is repeated in the array exactly 2 times

2.name: The value of an element occurs only once in the array

3.name: An element value is repeated more than 2 times in the array

9.name: What does it mean if the indexOf() and lastIndexOf() methods return different numbers?

0.name: The element value is repeated 2 or more times in the array

1.name: The value of the element is unique and is not repeated in the array

2.name: The value of an element occurs only once in the array

3.name: The value of an element repeats less than 2 times in the array
